quote: If I could sum up the Biznas difference in three words I would say, "partnerships over projects".  They don't want to - and in fact won't - sell you large untested and costly Apps which often miss the mark and need significant redevelopment.  Instead they help you focus on identifying the minimum product you need to validate your idea.  That means less money upfront and a greater likelihood of success at launch.  That success feeds user growth and generates incremental value which can be invested in future versions.  I have saved tens of thousands of dollars in development dollars partnering with the Biznas team but more importantly I have an App people want to use.
header: See how Jason, CEO of effortlessivf.ca, raised over $200k in 2 weeks with a Biznas built web page and app.

lines.title: PARTNER
lines.text: Effortless IVF, fertility for half the cost.

lines.title: RESULTS
lines.text: $100,000 raised in first 48 hours of kickstarter campaign.  Seamless customer funnel leveraging:

footer: Allowing their customer to learn, ask questions, talk to a doctor, register and pay.
